text.tspan: Draft objects are persisted as soon as
they are created. The resource file is
hidden in the file system (”dot file”).
The draft may be modified and
When persisted as the current revision, the draft resource is
renamed and unhidden. The leading dot is removed from
the resource name, exposing the canonical object name.
The current revision may be modified and persisted any
number of times, as long as the object content doesn’t change.
is locked and a new draft
When the draft is published and persisted, the former
current revision gets archived. The revision number
becomes part of the archived resource.
Again, changing the content of the
current revision results in a new
Additional archive revisions get their respective
revision numbers appended to their resource name.
The draft may again be modified
